attributes.action: Covert Human Intelligence Sources (Criminal Conduct) Bill 2019-21
attributes.background: This is a very dangerous bill, that will alter the accountability that the public must have over the police. Trust will be lost in the police and this is a step toward totalitarianism in the UK. We can not have this kind of legislation in this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553485
